artists.name: Logan Carroll
artists.title: Artist, Colorist
artists.bioIntro: Logan Carroll – An experienced Illustrator focusing on all manner of Pop Culture fandom, Logan has worked with some of biggest brands around to bring their properties to life.
artists.bio: Since 2011, he’s been working in his signature style, striving to create art that catches the eye and tells a story. Visit Logan's site to check out his other specatcular works or drop a line.

artists.name: James O'Reilly
artists.title: Artist, Colorist
artists.bioIntro: James O’Reilly - a professional artist for over a decade, James has worked in games, comics, exhibited in fine art galleries internationally and founded his own art studio, Orb Art Studio.
artists.bio: He has focussed almost exclusively on NFTs and crypto game art for the last 12 months. You can check out James' gallery or get in contact at james-oreilly.com.
